Series I. Historic Preservation and quality of life issues
Guggenheim Neighbors: A Concerned Community Opposed to the Planned Addition to the Guggenheim Museum [7 folders]
Guggenheim Neighbors: A Concerned Community Opposed to the Planned Addition to the Guggenheim Museum [7 folders]
Opposition to a proposed oversized addition to the Frank Lloyd Wright-designed Solomon R. Guggenheim Museum, an exterior and interior landmark at 1071 Fifth Avenue.
